<!DOCTYPE html>

                    odoo.define('web.csrf', function (require) {
                        var token = "";
                        require('web.core').csrf_token = token;
                        require('qweb').default_dict.csrf_token = token;
                    });
                
                
                    

                        
                        

                    

                    
                    

                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        $(function () {
                            odoo.define('dtdream_home.home', function (require) {
                                var HomeUI = require('dtdream_home.ui');
                                var ui = new HomeUI();
                                ui.appendTo($('.o_main'));
                                $.init();
                            });
                        });
